title: Bespoke sharing and export features
description:
Replace gog/Gmail workflows with platform-native capabilities. The platform is the integration layer, not CLI tools stitched with cron.

Needs:
- Export/download for work products (EPUB, PDF, markdown bundles)
- Share mechanism (generate links, push to Drive, or direct download)
- Cross-account artifact access without Gmail as middleman
- Book distribution workflow built into platform
- Any other workflows currently dependent on email

comments.author: jeff@devco
comments.body: DEVCO-5 (Pattern Harvesting) is the first use case for this. Patterns need to be exportable, shareable, and mergeable â€” the sharing/export feature should be designed with pattern distribution as the primary driver. Export a pattern as a self-contained package (schema + conops + use cases + assumptions). That IS the share mechanism.

comments.author: jeff@devco
comments.body: Built and deployed. 3 models (ExportPackage, ExportTemplate, ShareLink), 4 exporters (pattern, work product, article, bundle), pattern importer with preview mode, share links with token/password/expiry/max-downloads, full dashboard + API. Sentinel pattern test export: 7.3KB JSON package. Committed and pushed.
